sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' export default function CreateItem() { const [items, setItems] = useState({ id: null, title: "", description: "", completed: false, }) return (
handleSubmit(e)} id="form">
{setItems({...items, title: e.target.value})}} className="form-control" id="title" value={items.title} type="text" name="title" placeholder="Add task.." />
) }
